deck.content: Can only be played when you have 0 Elemental Dice left: Generate 2 different basic Elemental Dice.\n(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Ice
deck.content: Create 1 Cryo Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
deck.content: During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.\n(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Waters
deck.content: Create 1 Hydro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Soothing Water
deck.content: Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.\n(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Flames
deck.content: Create 1 Pyro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Pyro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Fervent Flames
deck.content: During this round, the next instance of Pyro-Related Reactions your current active character triggers deals +3 DMG.\n(You must have at least 2 Pyro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Thunder
deck.content: Create 1 Electro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: High Voltage
deck.content: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)\n(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Winds
deck.content: Create 1 Anemo Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
deck.content: Switch to the target character and creates 1 Omni Element.\n(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Stone
deck.content: Create 1 Geo Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock
deck.content: During this round, after your character deals Geo DMG next time: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides Shield, grant one such Status with 3 Shield points. \n(You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Weeds
deck.content: Create 1 Dendro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
deck.content: During this round, the next Elemental Reaction you trigger deals +2 DMG.\nYour Burning Flame, Dendro Core, and Catalyzing Field gain +1 Usage(s).\n(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Wind and Freedom
deck.content: In this Round, when an opposing character is defeated during your Action, you can continue to act again when that Action ends.\nUsage(s)：1\n(You must have at least 2 Mondstadt characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Stone and Contracts
deck.content: When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element.\n(You must have at least 2 Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Thunder and Eternity
deck.content: Convert all your Elemental Dice to the Type of the active character.\n(You must have at least 2 Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Nature and Wisdom
deck.content: Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.\n(You must have at least 2 Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
deck.content: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to Omni Element ×2.

deck.name: Changing Shifts
deck.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

deck.name: Toss-Up
deck.content: Select any Elemental Dice to <color=#FFFFFFFF>reroll</color>. Can reroll 2 times.

deck.name: Strategize
deck.content: Draw 2 cards.

deck.name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
deck.content: Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:\nCreate Omni Element ×1 and your current active character gains 1 Energy.

deck.name: Leave It to Me!
deck.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch will be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>.

deck.name: When the Crane Returned
deck.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you use a Skill:</color> Switch your next character in to be the active character.

deck.name: Starsigns
deck.content: Your current Active Character gains 1 Energy.

deck.name: Calx's Arts
deck.content: Shift 1 Energy from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.

deck.name: Master of Weaponry
deck.content: Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type.

deck.name: Blessing of the Divine Relic's Installation
deck.content: Shift 1 Artifact Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters.

deck.name: Quick Knit
deck.content: Choose one Summon on your side and grant it +1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>.

deck.name: Send Off
deck.content: Choose one Summon on the opposing side and cause it to lose 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>.

deck.name: Guardian's Oath
deck.content: Destroy all Summons. (Affects both you and your opponent!)

deck.name: Abyssal Summons
deck.content: Summon 1 Random Hilichurl Summon!\n(You must have at least 2 Monster characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Fatui Conspiracy
deck.content: Create 1 Fatui Ambusher of a random type on the opponent's field.\n(You must have at least 2 Fatui characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

deck.name: Plunging Strike
deck.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>.

deck.name: Heavy Strike
deck.content: During this round, your current active character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Normal Attack is a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>:</color> Deal +1 additional DMG.

deck.name: The Legend of Vennessa
deck.content: Create 4 basic Elemental Dice of different types.

deck.name: Friendship Eternal
deck.content: Players with less than 4 cards in their hand draw cards until their hand has 4 cards in it.

deck.name: Rhythm of the Great Dream
deck.content: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

deck.name: Jueyun Guoba
deck.content: During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Adeptus' Temptation
deck.content: During this Round, the target character's next Elemental Burst deals +3 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
deck.content: During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
deck.content: During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Sweet Madame
deck.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
deck.content: Heal the target character for 2 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Mushroom Pizza
deck.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Minty Meat Rolls
deck.content: Before this Round ends, the target character's next 3 Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
deck.content: Revives the target character and heals that character for 1 HP.\n(You can only revive 1 character via Food per Round, and a character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Sashimi Platter
deck.content: Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
deck.content: During this Round, all your characters' next Elemental Skills deal +2 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

deck.name: Butter Crab
deck.content: During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
